name: Shinkai: Spiritual Guidance Generator
description: Generates spiritual guidance based on confession text and religion
author: Shinkai

sqlTables.name: confessions
sqlTables.definition: CREATE TABLE confessions (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, confession_text TEXT NOT NULL, religion VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, guidance TEXT, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

sqlQueries.name: Get latest confession
sqlQueries.query: SELECT * FROM confessions ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
